IoTCube:
IoT-Wuerfel
GBS St. Gallen, 2022
* CayenneLPP
This file implements the CayenneLPP format for the data transmission.
IoTCube.ABP_Setup: Configure connection parameters. The data is stored on the device.
IoTCube.DownlinkEvent:
Blocks in this section will be executed if a downlink occured.
The draggable parameters hold the data from the downlink.
IoTCube.LoRa_Join|param|auto_join: is stored on the device and allows joining on power-up.
IoTCube.LoRa_Join|param|interval: is the time between join attempts
IoTCube.OTAA_Setup:
******************************************************************************
Procedures

Configure connection parameters. The data is stored on the device.
IoTCube.SendBuffer: Send a buffer over LoRa network.
IoTCube.SendBuffer|param|data: is buffer with data (usually in CayenneLPP format)
IoTCube.addAnalogInput: Add an analog input value to Cayenne buffer. Range from -327.68 to 327.67
IoTCube.checkEvent:
Returns true of selected event was triggered and not yet read.
The event is cleared after reading.
IoTCube.getCayenne: Buffer to be filled with messages to send.
IoTCube.resetModule:
Execute a reset on LoRa module (soft or hard)
Configuration is NOT ereased.
IoTCube.runDeviceSetup:
******************************************************************************
Background Processes

Device Setup
Prepare LoRa Module, function is called by watchdog
IoTCube.scaleToCayenne: Scale analog value to cayenne range.
IoTCube.serialListener:
Serial Listener
Runs in background loop to receive serial messages and react on payload
IoTCube.sleep: Send LoRa module into low power mode without communication
IoTCube.sleep|param|time: in miliseconds how long to sleep
IoTCube.watchdog:
Watchdog Process
Runs periodically in background to check device status
MCP_Defaults:

* Port Expander
This file defines the class for the MCP23008 port expander.
The relevant functions are exported to the "IoTCube"-Namespace.
eRAK_RC:
